snippet: With a convincing victory in San Francisco that included a two-R.B.I. performance from Jason Bay, the Mets have won four of their last five games
abstract: MLB Roundup; New York Mets defeat San Francisco Giants, 9-1; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: With a convincing victory in San Francisco that included a two-R.B.I. performance from Jason Bay, the Mets have won four of their last five games

headline.seo: Mets Beat the Giants, and They’re Looking Better
headline.main: Suddenly, the Mets Don’t Look So Bad
headline.print_headline: Roundup: Mets, With Boost From Offense, Continue a Surge
